meanings.sent1: The math problem was incomprehensible to the young students.
meanings.sent2: The alien language was incomprehensible to the human scientists.
meanings.sent3: Trying to explain quantum physics to a cat would be incomprehensible.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of the human brain is as incomprehensible as the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The concept of infinity can be truly incomprehensible to our finite minds.

meanings.definition: Beyond the ability to be understood.
meanings.sent1: The ancient hieroglyphics were incomprehensible to modern translators.
meanings.sent2: The reasons behind his actions seemed incomprehensible to his friends.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin teaching a fish to swim is incomprehensible but amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her beauty was incomprehensible, like a painting that changes every time you look at it.
meanings.sent5: The depth of his emotions was as incomprehensible as the depths of the ocean.
